p:
Subsequently, cytokine expression was monitored by RT-PCR using gene-specific primers (summarized in Table 2). RNA was reverse-transcribed with GoTaq 1-Step RT-qPCR System kit (Promega) followed by cytokine quantification (CFX Connect Real-Time PCR Detection System, Bio-Rad). Expression data from three independent experiment were relativized by 2 –Δ Δ
Ct with endogenous β-actin standard, and all values were estimated as fold above mock group. Moreover, viral M segment was quantified following the method described in one previous report ( Spackman and Suarez, 2008).
